sen.j: 長田景致（おさだ かげむね、生年未詳 - 建久元年（1190年））は平安時代末期の武将。
sen.e: Kagemune OSADA (birthday is unknown -1190) was a busho at the end of the Heian Period.
Kagemune OSADA (year of birth unknown -1190) was a busho who lived during the end of the Heian Period.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせて、「生年不詳」の訳を変更しました。表現を一部変更しました。
sen.e: Kagemune OSADA (year of birth unknown -1190) was a busho who lived during the end of the Heian Period.
He was the child of Tadamune OSADA
sen.cmt: 主語と述語を追加しました。
sen.e: He was the child of Tadamune OSADA

sen.j: 父、忠致の源義朝暗殺計画に加担し、実行の際には義朝の第一の郎従であり、自分の義兄弟でもある鎌田政清を斬っている。
sen.e: He participated in the plan led by his father, Tadamune, to assassinate MINAMOTO no Yoshitomo; moreover, he also killed Masakiyo, KAMATA, Yoshitomo's closest Vassal and Kagemune's Gikyodai (relathionship associated with each other as brother), during assassination.

He participated in the plan led by his father, Tadamune, to assassinate MINAMOTO no Yoshitomo; moreover, he also killed Masakiyo KAMATA, Yoshitomo's closest Vassal and Kagemune's Gikyodai (relationship associated with each other as brother), during the assassination.
sen.cmt: スペルミスを修正しました。不要なコンマを削除しました。冠詞を追加しました。
sen.e: He participated in the plan led by his father, Tadamune, to assassinate MINAMOTO no Yoshitomo; moreover, he also killed Masakiyo KAMATA, Yoshitomo's closest Vassal and Kagemune's Gikyodai (relationship associated with each other as brother), during the assassination.

sen.j: 平治物語においては、これ以外の場面でも常に父と一対で登場し、息の合った行動を見せている。
sen.e: He always appeared together with his father in "Tale of Heiji," beside this scene and they worked well together.
He always appeared together with his father in "Tale of Heiji," beside the scene of assassination and they worked well together.
sen.cmt: 一部の表現と冠詞を追加しました。
sen.e: He always appeared together with his father in "Tale of Heiji," beside the scene of assassination and they worked well together.

sen.j: その最期もまた父と同時であり、義朝の子源頼朝の命で処刑されたという。
sen.e: It is said that both Kagemune and Tadamune were also executed together by the direction of MINAMOTO no Yoritomo, a child of Yoshitomo.
It is said that both Kagemune and Tadamune were also executed together by the order of MINAMOTO no Yoritomo, a child of Yoshitomo.
sen.cmt: 適切な語句に変更しました。
sen.e: It is said that both Kagemune and Tadamune were also executed together by the order of MINAMOTO no Yoritomo, a child of Yoshitomo.

sen.j: また、彼の子孫は三河国へ逃れて永井と名乗ったとも、甲斐国へ逃げて今でも家名を保っているとも言われている。
sen.e: Furthermore, it is also said that his descendants escaped to Mikawa province and named themselves as NAGAI, or escaped to Kai province and retained the family name.
Furthermore, it is also said that his descendants escaped to Mikawa Province and named themselves as NAGAI, or escaped to Kai Province and retained the family name.
sen.cmt: 該当箇所の小文字を大文字に修正しました。
sen.e: Furthermore, it is also said that his descendants escaped to Mikawa Province and named themselves as NAGAI, or escaped to Kai Province and retained the family name.
